column2: The Immortal Queen keeps her true heart in a secret dungeon--hence her immortality.
The Immortal Queen has many children, with the plan of killing or warping all those who dissapoint her.
The Immortal Queen breaks all the art she touches.
The Immortal Queen is an expert in shapeshifting and polymorphing.
The Immortal Queen keeps a stable of criminals on hand as fan-wavers and snacks.
The Immortal Queen loves adventurers and has constructed an artificial dungeon to put them in.
The Immortal Queen sees art as sacred and artists as livestock.
